title: Barrett Collides With Sniper Wolf & Liquid Snake In Metal Gear Solid (Part 3)
description:
Metal Gear Solid is BACK! During part three of our play through Barrett, Mike, Blessing and Kevin push Snake forward as we fight Sniper Wolf, survive torture from Revolver Ocelot, and run up the tower of terror with Liquid Snake in a helicopter!
